title: What is accelerometer sensor in iPhone? - Quora

response.answer_text: The accelerometer is a device that can measure the force of acceleration, whether caused by gravity or by movement. An accelerometer can therefore measure the speed of movement of an object it is attached to. ... The use of the accelerometer in the iPhone is similar to that in the Wii, although on a smaller scale.
It detects movements so your phone can measure distance traveled location etc etc
